description: Audrey has once again been arrested for soliciting. Locked in her cell she waits for the guard. It's only a matter of time before he will release her, she knows the power she has over men and when she offers him sexual favors he quickly uncuffs her. He expects a blowjob, she expects to have some fun! Rico is cuffed to the bed and stripped, he is punished with his own leather belt and made to lick Audrey's ass...this is as close to her pussy he will ever get. It turns out Rico is ticklish and when tied down he can't take it...for him tickling is worse than being whipped. Lastly Rico is tied, bent over and fucked in the ass like a little bitch...he really should have known better than to mess with Audrey!
title: Audrey Leigh and Ricosf
